value.stringValue: Please select a day after today in order to request an inspection.
Please select a date below in order to schedule your inspection
Please pick a business day: Saturdays and Sundays are not available for inspections requests.

Flow.description: Adding in display text for when to schedule a inspection - JDS

formulas.name: Add_Business_Day
formulas.expression: CASE( MOD({!TodayVariable} - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, ({!TodayVariable}) + {!Number_Of_Days} + FLOOR(({!Number_Of_Days}-1)/5)*2, 1, ({!TodayVariable}) + {!Number_Of_Days} + FLOOR(({!Number_Of_Days})/5)*2, 2, ({!TodayVariable}) + {!Number_Of_Days} + FLOOR(({!Number_Of_Days}+1)/5)*2, 3, ({!TodayVariable}) + {!Number_Of_Days} + FLOOR(({!Number_Of_Days}+2)/5)*2, 4, ({!TodayVariable}) + {!Number_Of_Days} + FLOOR(({!Number_Of_Days}+3)/5)*2, 5, ({!TodayVariable}) + {!Number_Of_Days} + CEILING(({!Number_Of_Days})/5)*2, 6, ({!TodayVariable}) - IF({!Number_Of_Days}>0,1,0) + {!Number_Of_Days} + CEILING(({!Number_Of_Days})/5)*2, null)

Flow.label: Clayton Request Inspection Date

fields.name: successful_Confirmation
fields.fieldText:
Please review below to confirm your inspection date requests


Note: inspections are handled on a per-request basis. Please note that this is a request and NOT a confirmation.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Outstanding_Fees_pay_now
fields.fieldText: You have outstanding fees - please pay now.

fields.name: Create_Inspections_Text
fields.fieldText: Please select the inspections you would like to schedule from the list below:

fields.name: No_Pending_Inspections_Found
fields.fieldText:
Request Inspection Date


No inspections found. Please try again.

fields.name: No_Record_Id_Found
fields.fieldText:
appid: {!Application_Id}


Request Inspection Date


No inspections found. Try again.

fields.name: No_Inspections
fields.fieldText:
You currently have no inspections ready for scheduling.


Below you will find a list of scheduled, and future inspections associated to your current permit application.


As inspections are completed, you will be able to schedule the next inspection(s) sequentially.

fields.name: Request_Inspection_Date_Help_Text
fields.fieldText:
Request Inspection Date

To request an inspection date, please check the inspections you'd like to request, and proceed to the next page.

fields.name: Request_Inspection_Date_Failed
fields.fieldText:
Request Inspection Date Failed


Your request for an inspection date has failed.

fields.name: Request_Inspection_Date_Confirmation
fields.fieldText:
Request Inspection Date Confirmation


You have successfully requested an inspection date(s).

fields.name: PlanningRequest
fields.fieldText: For planning applications please schedule a date at least 5 business days from today

fields.name: Unable_To_Schedule
fields.fieldText:
You are not allowed to schedule inspections at this point in time.

You must be in your Engineering Inspection Phase.
